meanings.definition: An exercise or yoga pose in which the back is arched backwards.
meanings.sent1: During yoga class, she performed a graceful backbend.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast's backbend was so flexible and impressive.
meanings.sent3: He attempted a backbend but ended up looking like a banana.
meanings.sent4: Her backbend was like a rainbow stretching across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The backbend felt like a gentle curve in a flowing river.

meanings.definition: A gymnastic move in which the body is bent backwards.
meanings.sent1: The young gymnast practiced her backbend diligently.
meanings.sent2: His backbend in the routine wowed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The backbend made him feel like a contortionist in a circus.
meanings.sent4: Her backbend was as graceful as a swan gliding on water.
meanings.sent5: The backbend looked like a bridge connecting two worlds.
